pkg.name: ant-design-pro
pkg.description: An out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run gh-pages
scripts.lint: npm run biome:lint && npm run tsc
scripts.start:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev max dev
scripts.start:test: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev max dev

token.fontFamily: AlibabaSans, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif
AlibabaSans, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif

theme.preset-colors: pink, magenta, red, volcano, orange, yellow, gold, cyan, lime, green, blue, geekblue,
theme.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Noto Sans', sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'
theme.pagination-font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Noto Sans', sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'
theme.statistic-font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Noto Sans', sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'
